Title: Betterman
Description:

At the forefront of the battle is the mystifying Akamatsu Industriesâ€”disguised as a heavy machine factory in Tokyo, this undercover organization uses neural enhanced weapons known as NeuroNoids to battle Algernon. Also helping with their secret efforts is the mysterious mutant who is only known as "Betterman."', '
